
### what about 64-bit? 


* adds 8 more registers --- more bits for reg #?
* didn't change encoding for existing instructions, so…
* <em>instruction prefix</em> ‘‘REX’’ 

   * 32-bit x86 already had many prefixes

* also selects 64-bit version of instruction
